title: Looking for T205 Sovereign Cubs Have lots to trade!
author: milkit1

posts.post_title: Looking for T205 Sovereign Cubs Have lots to trade!
posts.post_content:
Looking for the following T205 Sovereign Cubs:
Kroh
Pfiefer
Mcintire
Archer
Graham
Kling
Kroh
Reulbach'
Schulte

Have LOTS of Sovereigns to trade mostly in fair-good condition. Email me!

Sean --

I wish I had some Cubs to trade for your Sovereigns, but I don't.  However, I might be able to knock a couple off your wantlist anyway!  I don't think Kroh and Schulte come with a Sovereign back, so that's two less you need.  Also, while I think Archer and McIntyre do, I haven't seen them to confirm it.  If you see either one (or any of the four for that matter), let me know!

Take Care,
Geno

Thanks Geno for the info! I was wondering that. I got about ten different Cubs Sovereigns including all the hofers. but I literally dont know anything about the Sovereigns. Also i noticed on mine that some of the green apple color like the T206's. Is that common?

I can confirm some of the cards for you but I do not have any to trade...

Kroh--might be possible but never seen (probably does not exist)
Pfiefer--confirmed
Mcintire--confirmed
Archer--confirmed
Graham--does not exist with a sov. back
Kling--confirmed
Reulbach--confirmed
Schulte--might be possible but never seen (probably does not exist)

Joshua
Thanks Joshua! I guess I can just get whatever backs of those last three.

Joshua --

Good catch - the Graham does have a Sovereign back, but only with the Rustlers front...

Take Care,
Geno
